no_image_to_save: No processed image available to save as baseline
confirm_delete:
Are you sure you want to delete {filename}?

This will move the file to the recycle bin.
please_mark_files: Please mark files using the tag button first.
send2trash_error: send2trash module not installed. Cannot delete file safely.
compare_loading: Original image is still loading, please wait...
optional_db_path: Optional: Path to custom XML database
restart_message: Please restart the application to apply language changes.
help_overview_text:
Raw Alchemy Studio is a professional RAW image processing application that provides powerful color grading and lens correction capabilities.

Key Features:
• RAW image processing with advanced demosaicing
• Professional color grading with Log/LUT support
• Automatic lens correction using Lensfun database
• Multiple metering modes for auto exposure
• Batch export with parameter preservation
• Baseline comparison for A/B testing
help_workflow_text:
1. Open Folder: Click "Open Folder" to load RAW images from a directory
2. Select Image: Click on a thumbnail in the gallery to load it
3. Adjust Parameters: Use the right panel to adjust exposure, color, and other settings
4. Mark Images: Press T or click the tag button to mark images for batch export
5. Export: Export current image or batch export all marked images
help_shortcuts_text:
Navigation:
• Left Arrow: Previous image
• Right Arrow: Next image

Image Operations:
• Space: Hold to compare with baseline/original
• T: Toggle mark/tag current image
• Delete: Move current image to recycle bin

The compare function shows your saved baseline if available, otherwise shows the original auto-processed image.
help_exposure_text:
• Auto Exposure: Automatically adjusts brightness using selected metering mode
  - Matrix: Evaluates entire frame (default)
  - Average: Simple average of all pixels
  - Center-Weighted: Emphasizes center area
  - Highlight-Safe: Protects highlights from clipping
  - Hybrid: Balanced approach

• Manual Exposure: Use EV slider for precise control (-10 to +10 EV)
help_color_text:
• Log Space: Convert to logarithmic color space for professional grading
  - Supports V-Log, S-Log3, Canon Log, etc.

• LUT: Apply 3D LUT files (.cube format) for creative looks
  - Click folder icon to select LUT directory
  - Choose from available LUTs in dropdown
help_lens_text:
• Automatic correction for distortion, vignetting, and chromatic aberration
• Uses Lensfun database with camera/lens EXIF data
• Custom database support for additional lens profiles
• Toggle on/off to compare corrected vs uncorrected
help_adjustments_text:
• Temperature/Tint: White balance adjustment
• Saturation: Color intensity (0-3x, default 1.25x)
• Contrast: Tonal contrast (0-3x, default 1.1x)
• Highlights/Shadows: Recover detail in bright/dark areas

Save Baseline: Saves current settings as reference point for comparison
Reset All: Resets to saved baseline or default values
help_export_text:
• Export Current: Save current image with applied settings
  - Formats: JPEG, HEIF, TIFF
  
• Export All Marked: Batch export all tagged images
  - Each image uses its saved parameters
  - Progress indicator shows export status
  - All images exported to selected folder
about_description: Raw Alchemy Studio is a professional RAW image processing application designed for photographers and colorists.
about_features_list:
• Advanced RAW image processing
• Professional Log/LUT workflow
• Automatic lens correction
• Batch processing capabilities
• Intuitive user interface
no_update_message: You are running the latest version {version}.
